Class BoidSuper

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • SwarmRobot
        • BoidSuper

  • public class BoidSuper
extends SwarmRobot
    BoidSuper is a parent to all fireflys. It contains methods used by Fireflys. Hides unnessecarily complicated or unintuitive code from the Firefly class.
    Version:
    1.0 19.03.2019
    Author:
    David Saunders

    • Method Detail

      • alignment

        protected int alignment()
        Method alignment Maintain firection of flock
        Returns:
        The heading that is the average of the neighbours heading.

      • averageOfAngles

        public int averageOfAngles(int[] angleArray)
        Method averageOfAngles Used only for boid flocking algorithm. The average of a set of angles cannot be found by simpily adding together the angles and dividing by the number of angles. A more mathematical approach is needed.
        Parameters:
        angleArray - An integer array with every item being an angle between 0 - 359
        Returns:
        An integer stating the average angle of the angles in angleArray

      • cohesion

        protected int cohesion()
        Method cohesion Maintane cohesion of flock by attracting this boid to the "Centre Of Mass" of neighbours.
        Returns:
        The heading towards the centre of the neighbours.

        protected int seperation()
        Method seperation Maintains distance between this boid and nearby neighbours.
        Returns:
        The heading needed to move away from other neighbours.
